name: FADE - Combat System Alpha Demo
description:
FADE is a RPG following the exploits of three characters as they pursue freedom and understanding of the chaos within the world they find themselves trapped within. Each awakens to a land covered in strife and madness as it's people murder, ruin, and devour one another within a foggy desolate forest surrounded by a world of dark fantasy.

FADE |The Wolves Hunt: A secondary mode within FADE focused around a strange creature pitting spirits against one another to allow him to select the perfect host, his new huntsman.

This demo in question is meant to test combat systems and performance.  Fade strives to be the first Soulslike including a battle royale mode. Some mechanics within this demo will be available in the royale mode.The plot progression of this demo is subject to change throughout development. Nothing is final. Interested in seeing this grow into its final goal? Find us on Patreon. Subscribing will greatly help us move forward while also giving us the chance to get your input about the game on our very own Discord Server as a full member. Discord

All thing's within this demo are subject to change.
